name: Scout
uniques: May upgrade to [Archer] through ruins-like effects
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

name: Ranger
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit
Can move after attacking

name: Explorer
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit
Can move after attacking
Founds a new city <on foreign continents>

name: Dromon
uniques: Cannot enter ocean tiles
[+50]% Strength <vs [Water] units>
Double movement in [All]

name: UU 1
uniques: Can transform to [Settler]
Cannot enter ocean tiles
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia

name: UU 2
uniques: Founds a new city <by consuming this unit>
Excess Food converted to Production when under construction
Requires at least [2] population
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
